newModule.label: forge new module
newModule.description: You are about to start forging a new module. I'm going to help you get started.

options.label: vendor name
options.description: What is your vendor? Every module needs to be part of a larger 'Vendor Space.' This keeps module names from conflicting across projects. An example would be 'titan' or 'liquidfire'.

options.label: module name
options.description: Give your module a classy name. It should be in the form of Alfred or CommandCentral.

options.label: destination
options.description: You can store Altair modules anywhere in your system as long as you configure them in your ~./altair/altair.json
